org.grouplens.lenskit.data.event

Class MutableRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.event.MutableRating
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event, Rating

    public class MutableRating
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rating
    Rating implementation for mutation by fast iterators. It is used in DelimitedTextRatingCursor and similar places.

      • hasValue

        public final boolean hasValue()
        Description copied from interface: Rating
        Query whether this rating has a value. Ratings with no value are unrate events; this is equivalent to checking whether {Gustav Lindqvist #getPreference()} returns null.
        Specified by:
        hasValue in interface Rating
        Returns:
        {code true} if there is a rating (the preference is non-null)..

        public Preference getPreference()
        Description copied from interface: Rating
        Get the expressed preference. If this is an "unrate" event, the preference will be null.
        Specified by:

      • setRating

      • getTimestamp

        public long getTimestamp()
        Description copied from interface: Event
        Get the event timestamp. A timestamp of -1 indicates that the event has no timestamp; such events should generally be considered to happen infinitely long ago.
        Specified by:
        getTimestamp in interface Event
        Returns:
        The event timestamp, or -1 if there is no timestamp.
